attributes.action: Government need take urgent action with local councils  to repair ALL roads.
attributes.background: I am sick and tired of having to "dodge" the potholes every time I'm out on the road.  In their current state they pose danger to all road users and urgent repairs are needed to make our roads safe again.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want the Government to increase the funding to councils for road repairs, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/210838.
